### nameFile(options) -> `string`

Name a file

| Param | Type | Description |
| ----- | --- | -------- |
| options | Object | Optional settings |
| options.dir | string,Array.&lt;string&gt; | Directory name |
| options.name | string | Name |
| options.type | string | Type of file |
